translation.title: ğŸš€ The $AIN Price Prediction Challenge
translation.intro-subtitle1: Win Total $600 USD Worth of $AIN Tokens in Just 1 Week!
translation.intro-info-desc: The 1st $AIN Price Prediction Contest is here! Get ready for an exciting challenge to participate in the 1st $AIN Price Prediction Contest and stand a chance to win up to $300 worth of $AIN Tokens.
translation.intro-play-content2-2: to get the credits and join the discussion
translation.intro-play-content3: 3ï¸âƒ£Â Submit your price prediction on the webpage.
translation.intro-play-content4: Notice: You can participate only once per wallet address.
translation.intro-reward-content1: Top 1 to 3 that most closely match the AIN/USDT price (based on the MEXC exchange) at 09:00(UTC) on August 4 (Fri) (excluding non-AIN holders)
translation.intro-reward-content2: - 1st Place: Up to $300 worth of $AIN Tokens
translation.intro-reward-content3: - 2nd Place: Up to $200 worth of $AIN Tokens
translation.intro-reward-content4: - 3rd Place: Up to $100 worth of $AIN Tokens
translation.intro-warning: * The current price updates every 5 seconds but may differ slightly from the real-time price on MEXC.
translation.event-warning-title: Consent for Collection and Use of Personal Information
translation.event-warning-detail1: The information will be used for the purpose of prize distribution and will be destroyed after the event ends.
translation.event-warning-detail3: Collection/Use Purpose: Confirmation of event participation and prize distribution
translation.event-warning-detail5: - You have the right to refuse consent for the collection/use of personal information mentioned above.
translation.event-warning-detail6: - However, if you refuse consent, it may limit your participation in the event.
translation.event-warning-detail7: I agree to the collection/use of personal information as described above.
